import React, { useState } from "react"; const bgcols = [ "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-blue-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-red-600", "bg-blue-600", ]; const BandSelector = ({ site, bands }) => { const [chosenBands, setChosenBands] = useState([]); const siteBands = bands[0][site]; const chooseBand = (band) => { if (chosenBands) { setChosenBands([...chosenBands, band]); console.log(chosenBands); } else { setChosenBands([band]); } }; return ( <>

Choose which bands you want to see

{siteBands.map((band, index) => { return (
chooseBand(band)} >

{band.name}

{band.stage}

); })}
); }; export default BandSelector;
